H0.text: Which bodily fluid is collected in a lachrymatory. Tears

H1.text: Which bodily fluid is collected in a lachrymatory. Saliva

H2.text: Which bodily fluid is collected in a lachrymatory. Mucus

H3.text: Which bodily fluid is collected in a lachrymatory. Wept

A4.text: A lacrymatory, a small vessel of terracotta or glass found in Roman and late Greek tombs, thought to have been used to collect the tears of mourners at funerals
